tool_description: This Email API is helpful to validate email addresses(single or bulk, using txt and csv), detect temporary, get fake emails, check free emails, check MX records and identify free/paid email service providers.
name: Email API
title: Email API

api_list.name: Get Fake Email Address
api_list.description: Get a fake business email address and job title
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-api8.p.rapidapi.com/fake_email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-api8.p.rapidapi.com/fake_email"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-api8.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
